abstract: Provide tactile feedback when people perform certain actions in your app.
overview:
Apple Pencil  Playing haptic feedback in your app  Playing haptic feedback in your app ArticlePlaying haptic feedback in your appProvide tactile feedback when people perform certain actions in your app.OverviewHaptic feedback provides a tactile response, such as a tap, that draws attention and reinforces both actions and events. While many system-provided interface elements (for example, pickers, switches, and sliders) automatically provide haptic feedback, you can add feedback to custom views and controls in your app when it’s suitable.

When providing feedback:

Always use feedback for its intended purpose. Don’t select a haptic because of the way it feels.
